page.title: 19ATTITUDES OF THREE LADIES.
page.content: {Also you are not too cut off from the {town. {3. Yes I find plenty of things to do {in the village. {4. No apart from cornwall coast. {5. Sheffield, Glasgow in Scotland and {Polmont in Scotland. These are the answers to the too extra questions we gave her. {1. I moved to the village for work {where I could look after my children {and Eyam is quite near Sheffield so it {is,nt far for my husband to go to {work. {2.I was attracted by the property we {bought , the village because it,s in {Derbyshire and you don,t need {transport to get to the amenities. { }
